moreBlocks.articles:
• d'Oliveira & Associates opens office in Woonsocket, RI, Personal Injury Blog, November 1, 2014
    d’Oliveira & Associates’ new Woonsocket, RI Personal Injury Law Office is located at 62 Hamlet Avenue, Woonsocket, RI 02895. The move will enable the Firm to maintain closer contact with its clients in the Woonsocket, RI area.
  • Have You Been Injured In A South Kingstown Car Accident?, Personal Injury Blog, December 22, 2015
    Getting injured in a South Kingstown car accident can be frightening and stressful. If you have been injured in a car accident, you probably have a lot of questions racing through your mind.
  • South Kingstown Motorcycle Accident Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    Our law firm has been getting cash settlements for South County and South Kingstown, RI residents now for over 28 years. We may be able to get you a cash settlement for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering.
  • South Kingstown Workers Compensation Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you were injured while working in South Kingstown, you may be able to collect workers’ compensation benefits made up of lost wages, medical bills, job retraining and in some cases a lump sum settlement, among other losses.
  • South Kingstown Slip and Fall Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured as a result of a slip and fall accident, you may be able to obtain a cash settlement for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.

description:
Advocating For You In South Kingstown, Rhode Island

If you live in Washington County, Rhode Island, and suffered an injury at work or as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions, you likely are scared and concerned about your situation. You need the services of an attorney devoted to helping you assert your rights to help you obtain the maximum amount possible for your pain and suffering.

At d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. in South Kingstown, we focus solely on personal injury, Social Security Disability and workers' compensation claims. Established in 1989 by top-rated attorney Paul d'Oliveira, our law firm has grown to include 15 offices across Rhode Island and Massachusetts, and our attorneys have secured over $200 million in settlements and awards on behalf of those we have served.

Fighting For You With Almost A Century Of Experience

Using our vast, nearly 100 years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm will fight hard to help you recover the compensation and benefits you need while holding the responsible parties accountable for their actions.

As tireless advocates for those in need, we work hard to deliver the personalized, compassionate attention our clients deserve while fighting aggressively to protect their rights and interests. Effective negotiators, we have settled over 95 percent of our cases outside of court, and as fierce trial attorneys, we have secured some of the largest verdicts ever awarded for personal injury claims.

Top-Rated Counsel You Can Trust

Regardless of how complex or challenging your case, you can trust d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. to help you obtain the finances you need to secure your future and provide the peace of mind you seek. For more information, you can contact our law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
